message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its advanced features and exceptional quality, it's truly a game-changer in its category. I believe you'll find immense value in it. For a limited time, I'm extending an exclusive offer to you. Would you like to experience the benefits firsthand? My proposal is to offer this outstanding product to you for $145. Let me know if this aligns with your expectations or if you'd like to discuss further.
